#Text=Understand
#Text=Due to its remarkable biodiversity , with over a third of the local plant species found nowhere else , Socotra has been designated a UNESCO World Heritage Site .
#Text=With over 40,000 inhabitants , though , it 's not just a nature reserve .
#Text=The Island is new to tourism , so if you are looking for a luxurious vacation this is not the right destination .
#Text=However , Socotra is a perfect destination for the adventurous and nature loving travelers .
#Text=Socotra takes pride in their eco - tourism and values their spectacular plant and wildlife that may sometimes be only found on this island .
#Text=Although the lodging and facilities may not be the same as more modern and developed locations , Socotra is a beautiful and magnificent destination choice .
#Text=Great care is shown to both guests and the environment .
#Text=Socotra is an eco - tourism system with limited infrastructure and new to the international tourist market , and therefore the hotel accommodations are not quite like other destinations .
#Text=However there are four hotels in Hadibo : Taj Socotra Hotel , Hafijj Hotel , Socotra Hotel , and Summer land Hotel .
#Text=These hotels may not be the most luxerious , but they do provide air - conditionting , televisions , and refrigerators in all of the rooms .
#Text=Most of the rooms at these hotels have their own bathroom , but there are a few rooms at the Hafijj Hotel and Socotra Hotel that must share bathrooms .
#Text=Fortunately , there is a restaurant in each of the hotels with simple yet delicious cuisine .
#Text=Considering Socotra is a fairly new eco - tourism destination , their facilities are decent .
#Text=In addition , there is also another hotel at the airport as well as multiple guest houses around the island .
#Text=The most popular lodging is actually camping on the beaches .
#Text=There are several campsites that allow tourists to barbeque on the beach with beautiful mountain views in the background .
#Text=Tourists can choose to purchase camping tour packages which include a driver or guide that will show tourists around the beaches as well as provide meals during their stay .
#Text=It is a fantastic way to enjoy the beauty and wildlife of the island .
#Text=A runway that provides fairly regular airline transportation was only constructed in 1999 .
#Text=Like everything else , infrastructure and transportation has only just begun in recent years .
#Text=There are also plans for new harbor facilities that will allow fisherman to sell and catch more easily and make importing food and fuel simpler .
#Text=In addition , there are also two information centers located at the airport and Hadibo .
#Text=When to go : Climate is an important consideration .
#Text=And this depends on your interest .
#Text=Nature enthusiasts should go from early October to late April .
#Text=The monsoon occurs in July till mid-August ( during July in the south east and south west of the island , wind surfing activity can be arranged ) .
#Text=Generally , wildlife and natural viewing is best from the end of January through May .
#Text=Get in
#Text=By plane
#Text=Dixam , in the centre of the island
#Text=There are flights from Sana'a via Al Mukalla .
#Text=Yemenia Airlines offers one flight per week on Thursday morning .
#Text=Felix Airways offers two flights per week on Wednesday afternoon and Saturday morning .
#Text=Flight durations are almost three hours .
#Text=There are also flights from Sharjah via Al Mukalla .
#Text=Get around
#Text=There is a public bus from the airport to Hadibo and from Hadibo to Qalansia .
#Text=Beside these two buses , there is no public transport , but car rental with driver is available .
#Text=There is a lot of walking and hiking along with camel back rides available .
#Text=See
#Text=Socotra is considered the jewel of biodiversity in the Arabian Sea .
#Text=Although the region is small , it is characterized by unique land and marine biodiversity .
#Text=The interior of the island is dominated by the beautiful and green Hagghier mountains and limestone plateau .
#Text=While on the outer coastline , breathtaking natural beaches have pure white sand dunes and palm trees .
#Text=Socotra Island is very rich and is home to many rare spectacular species of reefs , fish , birds , plants , and trees which are not found anywhere else in the world .
#Text=The limestone plateau and the Hagghier Mountains are the richest areas for endemic plant species , but endemics are found throughout the island in every type of vegetation .
#Text=One of the most famous plants is the dragon 's blood tree “ dracaena cinnabara ” which exists only on Socotra and nowhere else on the Earth .
#Text=The tree got its name because if any damage is made to the bark then a dark red liquid oozes out .
#Text=The dragon 's blood tree thrives in Socotra 's arid climate
#Text=There is also the Desert Rose ( adenium obesium ) which looks like a blooming elephant leg .
#Text=Also found in Socotra 's landscape is the ever - strange and extremely rare Cucumber Tree .
#Text=In addition there are over 120 species of birds and about 190 species of butterflies .
#Text=There is so much beauty all around the island , it is difficult not the appreciate to magnificent scenery and wildlife .
